Better than expected! Fits slightly small to size. After reading reviews I got a 8.5 when I’m usually a 8. Cushioning inside makes it comfy. Looks high end. It does gap on the sides when I walk but some shoes without much arch support will do that for ppl like me who have really flat feet

These ballerina flats are super cute! They fit true to size in my case and the quality seemed fine for the price. I actually really wanted to love these, but I just did not like the style on me and they were a bit stiff and uncomfortable due to the material.

评论概述: Very good knock off of a much more expensive brand
评论详情: I fell in love with this style and colour of shoe on a designer brand’s website, but refused to pay the designer price. When I found a pair that looked exactly the same on Amazon, I had to buy them. These flats are true to size, not too narrow, and were comfortable when I first put them on. After wearing them at the office for 8hrs, walking a mile to and from the restaurant for lunch, and around Target after work, I badly needed some bandaids for my baby toes and my left heel as I could feel blisters starting to form. This could be due to needing to break them in a little more. It will not stop me from wearing them to the office tomorrow though! Overall I found them extremely comfortable to wear all day. There isn’t any arch support, but my back did not hurt at the end of the day when I took them off like it does with some flats I have worn. Overall I feel like they are decent quality and very on trend right now. Highly recommend. Just break them in first before walking a country mile in them!
Además de que el material es muy duro no es True size debes ordenar medio número más.

These shoes are professional or casual for day to day. Comfortable to wear all day and great quality! I would add a little arch support but overall they are awesome!
Shoe is on trend right now. Soft enough not to give blisters. Hoping to break them in so my in-soles can be inserted. True to size. I’m a size 9 with flat feet.

The stitching starts coming apart a few wears in. The front of the shoe is not strong, looks like will get a hole soon.

OMG These shoes are fabulous!!!  Arrived very fast. The best thing about them is they come in half sizes. I wear a size seven, but a couple of people commented they were a bit snug. So, I ordered a seven AND a seven and a half. The seven did fit but it was very tight.  I could have stretched them but the seven and a half was perfect. Now, in fairness, it has to be said, I was flying somewhere and wearing them and flying home so I know my feet were swollen and maybe that is why the seven was so tight.  But they are lovely and comfy and I ordered them in every color.
Comfortable, but i don’t think these are real leather.  Very attractive.
Fit is good, style is great

The pair of two tone ballet flats arrived ahead of time and in good condition.  However, the heel on the actual shoes in about 1/2 the height as shown in the picture on Amazon and made of a rubberized material rather than the solid "wood looking" stacked heel in the picture.  It's less sturdy looking than the one in the photo.  Also, the shoes have a terrible smell - possibly glue?  I'll be returning these.  Too bad, because they're cute but with the different heel I don't feel they'll wear as well and therefore are not worth their $69 price tag.
